title: Fragments, ca. 1700
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: compound satin with supplementary weft
provenance: ex-collection: Mrs. George T. Bliss, Vitali Benguiat Collection.
description: Brilliant yellow satin ground with a profuse symmetrical design of silver, rose and ivory blossoms and serrated leaves in vases.
